title: Column Model
description: A column model contains the metadata of a single column of a TableEntity

name.description: The required display name of the column

columnSQL.description: The SQL representation of the column name that can be used to toggle sorting (passed this value over to SortItem)

columnType.description: The type of the select column or null if the type cannot be determined.

id.description: The optional ID of the select column, if this is a direct column selected
